verses.text_plain: The proverbs of Solomon. A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish son is the heaviness of his mother.
verses.verse_html: 1The proverbs of Solomon. A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish son is the heaviness of his mother.

verses.text_plain: Treasures of wickedness profit nothing: but righteousness delivereth from death.
verses.verse_html: 2Treasures of wickedness profit nothing: but righteousness delivereth from death.

verses.text_plain: The Lord will not suffer the soul of the righteous to famish: but he casteth away the substance of the wicked.
verses.verse_html:
3The Lord will not suffer the soul of the righteous to famish: but he casteth away the substance of the wicked. ▼
▼ the substance…: or, the wicked for their wickedness

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the substance…: or, the wicked for their wickedness
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the substance…: or, the wicked for their wickedness

verses.text_plain: He becometh poor that dealeth with a slack hand: but the hand of the diligent maketh rich.
verses.verse_html: 4He becometh poor that dealeth with a slack hand: but the hand of the diligent maketh rich.

verses.text_plain: He that gathereth in summer is a wise son: but he that sleepeth in harvest is a son that causeth shame.
verses.verse_html: 5He that gathereth in summer is a wise son: but he that sleepeth in harvest is a son that causeth shame.

verses.text_plain: Blessings are upon the head of the just: but violence covereth the mouth of the wicked.
verses.verse_html: 6Blessings are upon the head of the just: but violence covereth the mouth of the wicked.

verses.text_plain: The memory of the just is blessed: but the name of the wicked shall rot.
verses.verse_html: 7The memory of the just is blessed: but the name of the wicked shall rot.

verses.text_plain: The wise in heart will receive commandments: but a prating fool shall fall.
verses.verse_html:
8The wise in heart will receive commandments: but a prating fool shall fall. ▼
▼ a prating…: Heb. a fool of lips
 , ▼
▼ fall: Heb. be beaten

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a prating…: Heb. a fool of lips
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a prating…: Heb. a fool of lips
▼ fall: Heb. be beaten

verses.text_plain: He that walketh uprightly walketh surely: but he that perverteth his ways shall be known.
verses.verse_html: 9He that walketh uprightly walketh surely: but he that perverteth his ways shall be known.

verses.text_plain: He that winketh with the eye causeth sorrow: but a prating fool shall fall.
verses.verse_html:
10He that winketh with the eye causeth sorrow: but a prating fool shall fall. ▼
▼ fall: Heb. be beaten

footnotes.body_html: ▼ fall: Heb. be beaten

verses.text_plain: The mouth of a righteous man is a well of life: but violence covereth the mouth of the wicked.
verses.verse_html: 11The mouth of a righteous man is a well of life: but violence covereth the mouth of the wicked.

verses.text_plain: Hatred stirreth up strifes: but love covereth all sins.
verses.verse_html: 12Hatred stirreth up strifes: but love covereth all sins.

verses.text_plain: In the lips of him that hath understanding wisdom is found: but a rod is for the back of him that is void of understanding.
verses.verse_html:
13In the lips of him that hath understanding wisdom is found: but a rod is for the back of him that is void of understanding. ▼
▼ of understanding: Heb. of heart

footnotes.body_html: ▼ of understanding: Heb. of heart

verses.text_plain: Wise men lay up knowledge: but the mouth of the foolish is near destruction.
verses.verse_html: 14Wise men lay up knowledge: but the mouth of the foolish is near destruction.

verses.text_plain: The rich man’s wealth is his strong city: the destruction of the poor is their poverty.
verses.verse_html: 15The rich man’s wealth is his strong city: the destruction of the poor is their poverty.

verses.text_plain: The labour of the righteous tendeth to life: the fruit of the wicked to sin.
verses.verse_html: 16The labour of the righteous tendeth to life: the fruit of the wicked to sin.

verses.text_plain: He is in the way of life that keepeth instruction: but he that refuseth reproof erreth.
verses.verse_html:
17He is in the way of life that keepeth instruction: but he that refuseth reproof erreth. ▼
▼ erreth: or, causeth to err

footnotes.body_html: ▼ erreth: or, causeth to err

verses.text_plain: He that hideth hatred with lying lips, and he that uttereth a slander, is a fool.
verses.verse_html: 18He that hideth hatred with lying lips, and he that uttereth a slander, is a fool.

verses.text_plain: In the multitude of words there wanteth not sin: but he that refraineth his lips is wise.
verses.verse_html: 19In the multitude of words there wanteth not sin: but he that refraineth his lips is wise.

verses.text_plain: The tongue of the just is as choice silver: the heart of the wicked is little worth.
verses.verse_html: 20The tongue of the just is as choice silver: the heart of the wicked is little worth.

verses.text_plain: The lips of the righteous feed many: but fools die for want of wisdom.
verses.verse_html:
21The lips of the righteous feed many: but fools die for want of wisdom. ▼
▼ of wisdom: Heb. of heart

footnotes.body_html: ▼ of wisdom: Heb. of heart

verses.text_plain: The blessing of the Lord, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.
verses.verse_html: 22The blessing of the Lord, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.

verses.text_plain: It is as sport to a fool to do mischief: but a man of understanding hath wisdom.
verses.verse_html: 23It is as sport to a fool to do mischief: but a man of understanding hath wisdom.

verses.text_plain: The fear of the wicked, it shall come upon him: but the desire of the righteous shall be granted.
verses.verse_html: 24The fear of the wicked, it shall come upon him: but the desire of the righteous shall be granted.

verses.text_plain: As the whirlwind passeth, so is the wicked no more: but the righteous is an everlasting foundation.
verses.verse_html: 25As the whirlwind passeth, so is the wicked no more: but the righteous is an everlasting foundation.

verses.text_plain: As vinegar to the teeth, and as smoke to the eyes, so is the sluggard to them that send him.
verses.verse_html: 26As vinegar to the teeth, and as smoke to the eyes, so is the sluggard to them that send him.

verses.text_plain: The fear of the Lord prolongeth days: but the years of the wicked shall be shortened.
verses.verse_html:
27The fear of the Lord prolongeth days: but the years of the wicked shall be shortened. ▼
▼ prolongeth: Heb. addeth

verses.text_plain: The hope of the righteous shall be gladness: but the expectation of the wicked shall perish.
verses.verse_html: 28The hope of the righteous shall be gladness: but the expectation of the wicked shall perish.

verses.text_plain: The way of the Lord is strength to the upright: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.
verses.verse_html: 29The way of the Lord is strength to the upright: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.

verses.text_plain: The righteous shall never be removed: but the wicked shall not inhabit the earth.
verses.verse_html: 30The righteous shall never be removed: but the wicked shall not inhabit the earth.

verses.text_plain: The mouth of the just bringeth forth wisdom: but the froward tongue shall be cut out.
verses.verse_html: 31The mouth of the just bringeth forth wisdom: but the froward tongue shall be cut out.

verses.text_plain: The lips of the righteous know what is acceptable: but the mouth of the wicked speaketh frowardness.
verses.verse_html:
32The lips of the righteous know what is acceptable: but the mouth of the wicked speaketh frowardness. ▼
▼ frowardness: Heb. frowardnesses
